title: Research data quality: path-only, timestamp-only, duplicate-content
description: Analyze samples of path-only, timestamp-only, duplicate-content. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (path-only): Extract 5+ samples of 'path-only' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (path-only): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (timestamp-only): Extract 5+ samples of 'timestamp-only' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (timestamp-only): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (duplicate-content): Extract 5+ samples of 'duplicate-content' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (duplicate-content): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
